creator: robertlaferla@attbi.com
text:
There is no -S switch for httpd.  I think it is "-t -D DUMP_VHOSTS" but someone 
should verify that it has the same functionality.

So, the following is incorrect in the documentation:

>>> If you are trying to debug your virtual host configuration, you may find
>>> the Apache -S command line switch useful. That is, type the following
>>> command:
>>>
>>> /usr/local/apache2/bin/httpd -S

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
The -S switch was reintroduced in 2.0.44 (see changelog ;-)

Thanks for using Apache.
